title: Best of The Herd for Mar 31, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Mar 31, 2020
description:
Michael Jordan's Bulls reached a level of popularity no dynasty could ever match

Roger Goodell is doing the right thing but creating a unified message 

Colin disputes a story that he is being controlled by the Chargers 


Guest: Rich Kleiman, Kevin Durant's Manger and Business Partner 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
